buildCommand: cd Onchainweb && npm install && npm run build

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://vitals.vercel-insights.com https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.googleapis.com https://vitals.vercel-insights.com wss://*.walletconnect.com https://*.walletconnect.com https://vercel.live; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
